ygData.subject: Re: ManaRings
ygData.msgSnippet: Or, wisp in Felwithe is actually giant bee, not the kinda wisp in UO.  Same category as bats ;) Btw, if there a bard from S pore? Leshrec is training a wiz
ygData.messageBody:
Or, wisp in Felwithe is actually giant bee, not the kinda wisp in UO. Same
category as bats ;)
Btw, if there a bard from S'pore?

Leshrec is training a wiz too. Yiyang and Hutaya are monks. If we can get
a bard and a cleric/druid, we can start kicking ass liao ;) - 2 tanks block
monsters' attacks, 2 mage provide extra firepower, bard & cleric/druid
support whole team, COOL!


On Tuesday, May 18, 1999 11:50 AM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>
> wah Wisp is minor monster. I can only kill wisp safely by 10 lvl and
> that means with maybe 1 to 2 bubble of hp left. Wiz spells really good
man.
> Or is the wisp at Felwithe easier?
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 09:30
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] ManaRings
>
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > I come across players selling mana rings at 5pp in Felwithe. I got a
> > cutthroat ring from Leshrec (thx, hehe). That's my only magical item
so
> > far, +1ac and +2 dex. Can u tell us what's the stats for Dervish ring?
> > Also, mana ring is generating 5mana/sec or what? What u mean by "5
> sec"?.
> > Is is advisable to buy for a char with 40 mediation skill?
> >
> > Anyway, managed to earn a lvl with the help o fa lvl 10 Hong Kong
cleric
> > last night at bandit camp in GF. I'll be meeting him again tonight for
> > hunting again. Hopefully I can make it to lvl 8 and earn new spells.
Any
> > recommendation for wiz's armor? So far I'm wearing lousy clothings
only,
> > can't survive too long with low AC. Not aware of any better armors
which
> > are available for wiz (still new, no chance to see yet, hehe). I'm
saving
> > money for a great staff but the price is damn (*#$@ expensive - 20pp!!!
I
> > think when I reached lvl 8, the money in my bank is not even enuff for
me
> > to buy all the new spells, sigh. Maybe I have a spend a night hunting
all
> > minor monsters like wisp, skeleton and bat, no xp gain but at least can
> > loot stuffs to sell (waste of time sia!).
> >
> > Ziltus
> > Lvl 7 Wizard
> > (Wee! I can join you lvl 8-9 monks now, hehe)
> >
> > On Monday, May 17, 1999 12:37 PM, Wilson [SMTP:ritzbits@...]
> > wrote:
> > > Greetings!
> > >
> > > ManaRings go for about 12pp at my side. The cheapest I ever saw was
9pp.
> > However, they give only +5mana? Those a nurfed and a super-rip-off!
> > >
> > > I would recommend other rings instead....prolly the Dervish Ring. Or
the
> > Cutthroat Insignia Ring.
> > >
> > > My two cents,
> > > Wilson
> >
